name: Polygon War
description:
Made in less than 48 hours by SmallPhil for Ludum Dare.

Rate it here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=p...

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_smallphil

Hope you like it!

You should play with a controller if you have one. If you don't, use WASD and the arrow keys. :)
